au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.util
Class FilenameEncoder

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.util.FilenameEncoder

public class FilenameEncoder
extends java.lang.Object

Handling spaces in URLs is a particularly messy and gruesome business and has caused untold strife. These utility functions, as ugly as they may be, seem to solve the problem. Perhaps a big re-work of handling of URLs in Xena is in order.
